You cannot add more than 10 contacts

Calls should be scheduled before or after Fajr prayer time by 30 minutes

Institute of Geophysics, University of Tehran
Spiritual Administration of Muslims of Russia

Fajr Caller performs automatic calls for contacts added to contacts tab from your phonebook.
 Add contacts then select the time at which you need to start the scheduled calls and then press Set Alarms button.
 
 Calls are scheduled according to order of contacts addition in contact tab.
 First contact scheduled call will be at the chosen alarm time, and each selected contact will have its scheduled call a minute after.
 If call duration is more than 40 seconds another scheduled call will be performed until number of maximum call tries are reached.
 Number of call tries can be changed from Settings.
 
 Setting scheduled calls should be with 30 minutes of fajr prayer time.
 You can cancel scheduled calls by pressing Stop Alarms button.
 You can add up to 10 contacts maximum.
 You can delete contact by swiping to left.
 Order of contact can be readjusted by dragging the desired contact up or down in contact list.
